events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

Verena guides you to the hidden coordinates of the abandoned outpost where her brother awaits. She gestures with her knife. "My brother is an arrogant, boastful man. He is also, regrettably, every bit my equal in skill and technique. Do not underestimate him."

"I tell you this because many others have," she says, touching the scar on her face, "including myself?"

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} The mission will progress when the door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.newInstructions: {-} Place 1 Imperial mission token on the hero sheet / deployment card of each Rebel that was attacked during this activation.

eventActions.shortText: Open the door to the command center.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The mission will progress when the door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
Ivan Talos lays senseless on the ground as Verena places him in binders. She gives a rare smile. “It would appear that I emerge the victor this time, dearest brother.”

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Verena Talos receives the “Iron Hand” Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

Ivan's cruel laughter pursues you as you retreat. “That's two for me, dear sister!” he gloats. Verena does not speak for several days, spending all of her time practicing combat maneuvers and cursing under her breath.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
Ivan Talos smiles. “I'm glad you came, little sister. It was very kind of you to allow my droids to collect all of this information on your companions...”

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
An old door leads into the abandoned outpost where Ivan Talos is supposed to be.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} The neutral mission token represents Ivan Talos. Ivan Talos is an Imperial figure.
{-} If a Rebel figure with an Imperial mission token on its hero sheet / deployment card is attacking Ivan Talos, apply an additional +1 {G} to the defense results.

eventActions.bonuses:
DEFENSE STUDY: Discard 1 Imperial mission token from the sheet / card of the closest Rebel figure with an Imperial mission token on it. Ivan Talos gains +2 {g}.
IMPROVISATION: During this activation, this figure can use IMPROVED CLOSE QUARTERS on Rebel figures without Imperial mission tokens on their sheets.
ATTACK STUDY: Distribute X {h} as evenly as possible between Imperial figures within 3 spaces of this figure, where X is the number of Imperial mission tokens on hero sheets.
eventActions.abilities: Know Your Enemy:If a Rebel figure with an Imperial mission token on its hero sheet / deployment card is attacking Ivan Talos, apply an additional +1 {G} to the defense results.
eventActions.customText:
{Q} IMPROVED CLOSE QUARTERS: Move 2 to interact with a Rebel and discard 1 Imperial mission token from that Rebel's sheet / card. Choose the best weapon that Rebel is carrying and perform 2 attacks using that weapon. 
{-} If this figure did not perform IMPROVED CLOSE QUARTERS, discard 1 Imperial mission token from the closest Rebel with an Imperial token on its sheet / card. That hero suffers 2 {C}.
{A} ORDER: Another Imperial figure with a figure cost of 6 or less that can perform an attack attacks {rebel}.
{Q} If this figure did not use ORDER, move 3 to attack {rebel}.
{Q} Move 1 to attack {rebel}.
{A} Move 3 to engage the other Imperial figure with the most Health remaining.
{A} If this figure is not adjacent to another Imperial figure, move 4 to reposition 5.
{-} COWER: If adjacent to another Imperial figure, recover 2 {H}. The adjacent non-<color="red">Focused</color> Imperial figure with the highest figure cost becomes <color="red">Focused</color>.

eventActions.tbText: Two bodyguards take their positions in front of Verana's brother.

Smiling provocatively, Ivan beckons his sister over.

{-} The Rebels win when Ivan Talos is defeated.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The neutral mission marker represents Ivan Talos. Ivan Talos is an Imperial figure.
{-} If a Rebel figure with an Imperial mission token on its hero sheet / deployment card is attacking Ivan Talos, apply an additional +1 {G} to the defense results.
{-} The Rebels win when Ivan Talos is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

mapEntities.mainText:
An old door leads into the command center of the abandoned outpost where Ivan Talos is supposed to be.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.
